p: They define infection as “the ‘process or state of establishment of a pathogenic microorganism or virus in a living organism’ (2), or ‘the entry of an organism or virus into a host and the establishment of a permanent or temporary parasitic relationship’ (28, 36). NPV (21) clearly defined infection as ‘the landing of a pathogen on a host and the initiation of any type of parasitic activity.’ Infection is thus closely associated with pathogenic activity.”
